name: VSTSToolsKeep
description: Sets the retention for the current build to 'keep forever'.
author: Moonspace Labs, LLC
helpMarkDown: Sets the retention for the current build to 'keep forever'.

inputs.name: targetbranch
inputs.label: Target Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: The branch that must be built for this task to be executed (e.g. master).

inputs.name: debugonly
inputs.label: Execute on Debug Only
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, executes only when **system.debug** is set to **true**.
